mapper.select: select ms.id,ms.number,ms.rel_quotation,ms.sup_quotation,ms.delivery_time,ms.user_id,ms.status as medic_status,mi.name,mi.status as meinfo_status from medica_supplies ms LEFT JOIN medical_information mi on mi.id= ms.medtion_id where 1=1 and ms.id= #{id}
select companyName from supplie_details where gysid=( select gysid from sys_user where username=#{username})

select count(pa.id) from medica_supplies ms LEFT JOIN medical_information mi on mi.id= ms.medtion_id LEFT JOIN purchasing_application pa on pa.mesu_id=ms.id where 1=1 and mi.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and pa.status = #{status}

select pa.id,ms.number,ms.rel_quotation,pa.gysmoney,ms.delivery_time,pa.status as purapp_status,mi.name,mi.status as meinfo_status from medica_supplies ms LEFT JOIN medical_information mi on mi.id= ms.medtion_id LEFT JOIN purchasing_application pa on pa.mesu_id=ms.id where 1=1 and mi.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and pa.status = #{status}
limit #{start} ,10
